login.title: Login

login.resetText: The verification email will be sent to the mailbox. Please Check it.

login.changePasswordTxt: Please enter your current password and the new one !

login.passwordValidation:
Your password is not valid, please add password at least 8 characters with numbers, uppercase, lowercase
 letters .
